element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithm crops a given grid using a polygon vector layer. The resulting raster layer has the minimum extent needed to cover all the polygons in the input layer and valid values only on those cells that are inside any of the polygons of the input vector layer. All the remaining cells have the no-data value.

element.name: POLYGONS
element.text: A polygon layer which delimitates the area to crop.

element.name: RESULT
element.text: The resulting layer containing valid values only on those cells that fall inside the polygons of the vector input layer.
